data.name: Dialtown: Phone Dating Sim Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: This is the store page for Dialtown: Phone Dating Sim's Original Soundtrack, composed by Nathan Hanover. The soundtrack contains every track used within Dialtown, and many original mixes, encompassing 69 total tracks! The OST contains 315 minutes (almost 5 and a half hours of audio)!
